text: I see, thanks for the photos.
Those units look pretty tall in the photo. Seems like the height of the bamboos (Phyllostachys or Fargesia) would be helpful there

I think Phyllostachys looks better, but as a running bamboo, they'd fill up the container quickly and at some point start to look scrappy. The Fargesia is a clumping bamboo as opposed to running, so it would be happier in a container longer term, and the one they suggested is one of the better looking Fargesias, in my opinion.
(and yes, those units are pretty tall )
no problem. it's fun to get a preview.
I'm looking forward to being able to host events up there - I think it'll be a fun space
It's going to be amazing, especially with the city view at sunset.
